remarks: The intersection of closed subspaces (the range of isomorphism H) is a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihintcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihintcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihintcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( S C_ ran I /\ S =/= (/) ) ) -> |^| S e. ran I ) $.
